name: The Iron Hand in the Velvet Glove
name_original: The Iron Hand in the Velvet Glove
description:
The Iron Hand in the Velvet Glove is a simulation game developed by Coleo_Kin. It came out on 26-12-2020.
You can play The Iron Hand in the Velvet Glove on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
